sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const CheckoutComponent = ({ config, data }) => { const { items = [], subtotal = 0, shipping = 0, total = 0, appliedCoupons = [] } = data; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return `AED ${parseFloat(amount).toFixed(2)}`; }; return (

Checkout

Order Summary
{items.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

{formatCurrency((item.salePrice || item.price) * item.quantity)}
))}
Payment Summary
Subtotal: {formatCurrency(subtotal)}
Shipping: {formatCurrency(shipping)}
{appliedCoupons && appliedCoupons.length > 0 && (
Discount: -{formatCurrency(appliedCoupons.reduce((sum, coupon) => sum + coupon.discountAmount, 0))}
)}
Total: {formatCurrency(total)}
); }; export default CheckoutComponent;
